component._description: A bouncer that authenticates based on remote IP address.

property.name: deny-default
property._description: Whether to default to denying authentication. Defaults to True, which is equivalent to Apache's 'Order Allow,Deny'

property.name: allow
property._description: A match rule for allowing authentication. Match rules are IP blocks, such as 127.0.0.1/32.

property.name: deny
property._description: A match rule for denying authentication. This uses the same syntax as the allow rules.
